mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news_info (title, news_image, content, summary, author, status, reject_reason, create_time, update_time, deleted, create_user_id, is_top, view_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{newsImage}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{author}, #{status}, #{rejectReason}, NOW(), NOW(), #{deleted}, #{createUserId}, #{isTop}, #{viewCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM news_info WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
